DOC.brief_summary: Prospective study evaluate efficacy use self-retained cryopreserved amniotic membrane debridement treat Epithelial Base Membrane Dystrophy ( EBMD ) optimize ocular surface integrity intraocular lens calculation cataract surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Optimizing Ocular Surface Prior Cataract Surgery
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects significant EBMD contemplate cataract surgery . 2 . Age range : 50 year old . 3 . Both Genders ethnic group comparable local community . 4 . Subjects able understand willing sign write informed consent . 5 . Subjects able willing cooperate investigational plan . 6 . Subjects able willing complete postoperative followup . 1 . Subjects know intolerance PKS know allergy preservative medium . 2 . Subjects symblepharon lid abnormality prevent PKS placement . 3 . Ocular infection within 14 day prior study entry . 4 . Previous ocular surgery injury within 3 month enrollment . 5 . Subjects history nonhealing epithelial defect neurotrophic keratitis . 6 . Inability unwillingness subject give write informed consent , follow investigational plan complete postoperative followup .
